title: Display workflow fields in TUI detail pane
description:
Update TUI detail pane to show requires, awaiting, and verdict fields

Current detail view shows:
- Title, Description, Status, Priority, Type
- Owner, Labels, Parent, Blocked By
- Acceptance Criteria, Notes

Add new section for workflow state:
---
Workflow:
  Requires: approval
  Awaiting: approval (waiting for human)
  Verdict: (pending)
---

Only show section when at least one field is set.
Use colors to indicate state:
- Awaiting: Yellow/orange (needs attention)
- Approved verdict: Green
- Rejected verdict: Red

Implementation in internal/tui/model.go renderDetail() function.
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Requires field displayed when set
- [ ] Awaiting field displayed when set
- [ ] Verdict field displayed when set
- [ ] Section hidden when no workflow fields set
- [ ] Colors indicate state
closed_reason: Added Workflow section to TUI detail pane showing requires, awaiting, and verdict fields. Uses Catppuccin colors: yellow for awaiting, green for approved verdict, red for rejected verdict. Section only displays when at least one workflow field is set.
